name: Landsat-download
tagline: Automated download of LANDSAT data from USGS website
body:
### Welcome to LANDSAT-Download pages.

This tool written in Python language will help you automatically download LANDSAT data form the USGS earthexplorer web site. It was primarily included in [CESBIO Multitemp blog](http://www.cesbio.ups-tlse.fr/multitemp/), then moved here for a better convenience.

## How it works
There is a short user manual here :
+ https://github.com/olivierhagolle/LANDSAT-Download/wiki

## Get the code
You may directly read the code here :
+ https://github.com/olivierhagolle/LANDSAT-Download

## Other Landsat products
Finally, the THEIA Land Data Center also distributes all the LANDSAT8 data acquired above France, with an accurate cloud mask and a good atmospheric correction. You can access them here :
+ http://www.theia-land.fr/en/products/landsat-5-7-and-8

## Sentinel-Download
I have also written a much simpler tool to get ESA Sentinel data.
+ http://olivierhagolle.github.io/Sentinel-download/
